mapper.update: update l_grain_rank set keyid=keyid ,inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} ,grade1=#{grade1} ,grade2=#{grade2} ,grade3=#{grade3} ,grade4=#{grade4} ,grade5=#{grade5} ,grade6=#{grade6} ,orderno=#{orderno} where keyid=#{keyid}

update l_grain_rank set keyid=keyid ,grainid=#{grainid} ,inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} ,grade1=#{grade1} ,grade2=#{grade2} ,grade3=#{grade3} ,grade4=#{grade4} ,grade5=#{grade5} ,grade6=#{grade6} ,orderno=#{orderno} where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and inspectitemid=#{Where_inspectitemid} and grade1=#{Where_grade1} and grade2=#{Where_grade2} and grade3=#{Where_grade3} and grade4=#{Where_grade4} and grade5=#{Where_grade5} and grade6=#{Where_grade6} and orderno=#{Where_orderno}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.grade1 "grade1", t.grade2 "grade2", t.grade3 "grade3", t.grade4 "grade4", t.grade5 "grade5", t.grade6 "grade6", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grain_rank t where keyid=#{keyid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.grade1 "grade1", t.grade2 "grade2", t.grade3 "grade3", t.grade4 "grade4", t.grade5 "grade5", t.grade6 "grade6", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grain_rank t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.grade1=#{grade1} and t.grade2=#{grade2} and t.grade3=#{grade3} and t.grade4=#{grade4} and t.grade5=#{grade5} and t.grade6=#{grade6} and t.orderno=#{orderno}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.grade1 "grade1", t.grade2 "grade2", t.grade3 "grade3", t.grade4 "grade4", t.grade5 "grade5", t.grade6 "grade6", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grain_rank t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.grade1=#{grade1} and t.grade2=#{grade2} and t.grade3=#{grade3} and t.grade4=#{grade4} and t.grade5=#{grade5} and t.grade6=#{grade6} and t.orderno=#{orderno}
mapper.delete: delete from l_grain_rank where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and inspectitemid=#{Where_inspectitemid} and grade1=#{Where_grade1} and grade2=#{Where_grade2} and grade3=#{Where_grade3} and grade4=#{Where_grade4} and grade5=#{Where_grade5} and grade6=#{Where_grade6} and orderno=#{Where_orderno}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.grade1 "grade1", t.grade2 "grade2", t.grade3 "grade3", t.grade4 "grade4", t.grade5 "grade5", t.grade6 "grade6", t.orderno "orderno", lg.grainname "grainname", li.itemname "itemname" from l_grain_rank t left join l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid left join l_inspect_item li on li.inspectitemid=t.inspectitemid where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.grade1=#{grade1} and t.grade2=#{grade2} and t.grade3=#{grade3} and t.grade4=#{grade4} and t.grade5=#{grade5} and t.grade6=#{grade6} and t.orderno=#{orderno}

select count(*) from l_grain_rank t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.keyid!=#{NoId} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.grade1=#{grade1} and t.grade2=#{grade2} and t.grade3=#{grade3} and t.grade4=#{grade4} and t.grade5=#{grade5} and t.grade6=#{grade6} and t.orderno=#{orderno}
select t.* from l_grain_rank t where 1=1 and t.grainid=#{grainid}
